tool_description: Tracks the frequency and distribution of word usage across different historical periods, generating temporal usage patterns and trend analysis.

word.description: The word to track for historical usage patterns

interval_size.description: Size of time intervals in years for frequency calculation

normalize_frequency.description: Whether to normalize frequency by total word count per period

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_year must be less than end_year.
Time range too large: Reduce the range between start_year and end_year to less than 2000 years.
Invalid interval size: Set interval_size between 1 and 500 years.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data available for the specified time range.
Word not found: The specified word has no recorded usage in the given time period.
usage: Provide word, start_year, and end_year. Optionally set interval_size and normalize_frequency to control temporal granularity and frequency calculation method.

usage_frequencies.description: Usage frequency for each time interval

trend_direction.description: Overall trend: increasing, decreasing, stable, fluctuating

peak_usage_period.description: Time period with highest usage frequency

usage_summary.description: Summary of historical usage patterns and notable changes
